name: Victus Journal
landing_text: Welcome to Victus!$(br)To begin, check out $(l:victus:basics/introduction)Introduction$().$(p)Should you have problems or discover a bug, feel free to join our $(l:https://discord.com/invite/xrwHKktV2d)Discord$() or report them on $(l:https://github.com/glisco03/victus/issues)GitHub$().$(p)$(o)$(#999999)Improving lives - one heart at a time$()
